name: 20 Seconds Till Judgment
description:
Can you slay your foes and make a name for yourself in 20 seconds?

This game was made for the 20 Second Game Jam (Nov 4th to Dec 5th, 2022), under the jam's objective:

"20 Second Game Jam invites you to make a mini-game that lasts exactly 20 seconds, from start to finish—a tiny burst of gameplay that drops the player straight into the action!"

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Aim with mouse
  • Sprint with right-click or shift
  • Upgrade by clicking the buttons on the right, or pressing 1, 2, or 3

This game uses free assets, including:

Action RPG Music Free -- VGcomposer (Unity Asset Store)
